name: DoctorLogic Team
title: Building Better Websites
desc: DoctorLogic helps practices grow by providing the most advanced digital marketing strategies through web development!

name: Andre Riley
title: VP of Sales and Marketing
desc: For over 10 years, Andre has been helping small & medium-sized businesses grow their revenue through online marketing.

title: Director of Content
desc: Kristy leads our team of talented medical writers, inspiring informative and effective content creation through passion and experience.

desc: Justin oversees the amazing team that makes it happen, which is gathering what is needed to assemble, build, and launch gorgeous websites both our clients and the search engines love!

name: Chris Desrochers
title: VP, Product Strategy
desc: Chris oversees product strategy for DoctorLogic. He helps craft our platform to perform for Google, patients, and doctors alike. He's got a knack for analogies and solving hard technical challenges.

name: John Vakidis
title: Regional Account Manager
desc: John specializes in helping practices learn more about online marketing and how they can increase their patient volume.

desc: Julie has over 20 years experience of helping doctors create and maintain wealth by solving practice operational problems, overcoming reimbursement challenges and creating alternative revenues.

title: Regional Account Manager
desc: Mary is passionate about helping doctors grow their practice through digital marketing.

name: Matt Sparks

title: Marketing Director
